name: Exotica Technologies
desc: The %s has improved performance thanks to Exotica Technologies.
short: This ship has improved stats thanks to Exotica Technologies.

name: Alpha Subcore
desc: An Alpha Core has been integrated into the ship to divert critical calculations that are performed best by something beyond the limitations of biology.
short: This ship benefits from an Alpha Core handling critical ordnance systems. Weapon ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s/%s. Fighter/bomber ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s.

name: Daemon Core
desc: A Daemon Core has been integrated into the ship to divert most calculations to something beyond the limitations of biology and most other forms of technology.
short: This ship benefits from a Daemon Core handling critical ordnance systems. Weapon ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s/%s. Fighter/bomber ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s. Damage dealt and received is increased by %s.

name: Automated Alpha Subcore
desc: An Alpha Core has been integrated into the ship to divert critical calculations that are performed best by something beyond the limitations of biology.
short: This ship benefits from an Alpha Core handling critical ordnance systems. Weapon ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s/%s. Fighter/bomber ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s. Automated ship points is reduced by %s.

name: Automated Daemon Core
desc: A Daemon Core has been integrated into the ship to divert most calculations to something beyond the limitations of biology and most other forms of technology.
short: This ship benefits from a Daemon Core handling critical ordnance systems. Weapon ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s/%s. Fighter/bomber ordnance costs are reduced by %s/%s. Damage dealt and received is increased by %s. Automated ship points is reduced by %s.
